text: Maria Gaspari (born 9 December 1991 in Pieve di Cadore) is an Italian curler. Gaspari Is currently the alternate player for Team Federica Apollonio She plays in lead position as a lead and is right-handed. ==References== *2016 Worlds Media guide *http://www.worldcurling.org/wwcc2016/teams ==External links== * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female curlers Category:People from the Province of Belluno
title: Maria Gaspari
